content: FYI - the Loom paper is out - as some of you know, we have been experimenting with Loom as one back end for code reasoning: https://verse-lab.github.io/papers/loom-preprint.pdf

Hereâ€™s the discussion thread where I ask about possible use in CSLib. I am actually experimenting with basic algorithms on it.
